text: This material in IRM 1.2.50 has been moved to IRM 1.2.2.12 Delegation of Authorities for Taxpayer Advocate Service Activities. All Delegation Orders contained in IRM 1.2.40 through IRM 1.2.54 were consolidated and moved to IRM 1.2.2, Servicewide Delegation Orders. This IRM has been updated to include the following revised delegation order.
